title: Australian diary. No. 013
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Jack S. Allan
brief_description: This newsreel looks at Grafton in New South Wales - a centre of progress and culture. The shape of things to come in glass is highlighted. Experiments with lucerne demonstrate its amazing growth. The Sydney Harbor Bridge is painted and Armidale University is shown.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian National Film Board and Jack S. Allan
